column2: are there any italian restaurants nearby with NUMBER_0 star reviews ?
column3: @org.schema.Restaurant . Restaurant ( ) filter any ( @org.schema.Restaurant . Review ( ) filter in_array ( id , review ) && reviewRating . ratingValue == NUMBER_0 ) && servesCuisine =~ " italian " ;

column2: what kind of food does this restaurant serve ?
what is the telephone number and location of the nearest chinese restaurant ?
column3: [ geo , telephone ] of ( [ * , distance ( geo , $location . current_location ) ] of sort ( distance ( geo , $location . current_location ) asc of @org.schema.Restaurant . Restaurant ( ) filter servesCuisine =~ " chinese " ) ) [ 1 ] ;

column2: where is the closest club bar 's ?
column3: [ geo ] of ( [ * , distance ( geo , $location . current_location ) ] of sort ( distance ( geo , $location . current_location ) asc of @org.schema.Restaurant . Restaurant ( ) filter name =~ " club bar " ) ) [ 1 ] ;

column2: show me the closest orient express
column3: ( [ * , distance ( geo , $location . current_location ) ] of sort ( distance ( geo , $location . current_location ) asc of @org.schema.Restaurant . Restaurant ( ) filter name =~ " orient express " ) ) [ 1 ] ;

column2: display all review descriptions authored by areeba vaughan .
column3: [ description ] of @org.schema.Restaurant . Review ( ) filter author == null ^^org.schema.Restaurant:Person ( " areeba vaughan " ) ;

column2: what is the phone number for panera bread ?
column3: [ telephone ] of @org.schema.Restaurant . Restaurant ( ) filter id == null ^^org.schema.Restaurant:Restaurant ( " panera bread " ) ;

column2: can you tell me the rating of legend restaurant in LOCATION_0 ?
column3: [ aggregateRating.ratingValue ] of @org.schema.Restaurant . Restaurant ( ) filter geo == LOCATION_0 && name =~ " legend restaurant " ;

column2: find a afghan restaurant with NUMBER_0 or more stars .
column3: @org.schema.Restaurant . Restaurant ( ) filter aggregateRating . ratingValue >= NUMBER_0 && servesCuisine =~ " afghan " ;

column2: search for japanese restaurants with NUMBER_0 star reviews or better .
column3: @org.schema.Restaurant . Restaurant ( ) filter aggregateRating . ratingValue >= NUMBER_0 && servesCuisine =~ " japanese " ;
